pages.text: Reinforced with $(l:resources/runed_obsidian)runed obsidian$(), this strengthened pyre (when combined with $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones$() likewise made of runed obsidian) can withstand practically any destructive force, explosive or otherwise.$(br2)$(info) This pyre is wither-proof and immune to the Ender Dragon.$(br2)$(info) This pyre functions identically to a $(l:basics/pyre)regular pyre$().
